name: Super Survival Remix 3
description:
A game made for the MTV Game Jam, Monza, 2015.

Super Survival Remix 3 is a multiplayer mix of around 10 different arcade games, all played in the same screen.

Goal:

Survive!

Controls:

Player 1: WASD and Left Ctrl

Player 2: Arrows and Right Ctrl

Also supports joypads

Made by: Alice De Girolamo, Fabio Ferrara, Fabio Taurisano, Matteo Marras, Michele Pirovano, Pier Luca Lanzi
